title: [Sphere and Scythe, Memoriam]
description: This perfectly square room expands into the depths of the stone walls that surround it.  In the northern apex a recessed alcove is positioned above two folded wings cradling a perfectly formed crystal sphere.  Engraved above the alcove in detailed script are the words, "With undying love, we commit you to memory."  Three massive tapestries line the remaining walls.
